user_input: Please create hourly Electricity demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the TYNDP 2026 scenario specifications without accessing any PLEXOS database.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly electricity demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios using 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.

tasks.description: Generate hourly electricity demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using the specified NT variants and target years.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select and generate the appropriate demand profile objects for the specified scenarios and years.

tasks.description: Split the nodes in the generated profiles according to the scenario requirements.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, identify the nodes that need to be split as per scenario specifications.

tasks.description: Convert the split demand profiles into the TST format for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, transform the split demand profile objects into the standard TST workbook format.
